features.name: DamageImmunities
features.description: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

features.name: Languages
features.description: Common plus up to five other languages

features.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
features.description: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

features.name: Rejuvenation
features.description: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description:
The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared: 

â¢ Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
â¢ 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
â¢ 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image
â¢ 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball
â¢ 4th level (3 slots): blight, dimension door
â¢ 5th level (3 slots): cloudkill, scrying
â¢ 6th level (1 slot): disintegrate, globe of invulnerability
â¢ 7th level (1 slot): finger of death, plane shift
â¢ 8th level (1 slot): dominate monster, power word stun
â¢ 9th level (1 slot): power word kill

features.name: Turn Resistance
features.description: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.description: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.description: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.description: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
